titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: Knowling celebrated at 8 a.m. There were many communicants. After Mattins & Litany I read the Commination from the Pulpit. The Precentor then ended the service at the Fauld Stool. At the special service in the evening the Precentor preached.
